title: Exploring Japan
description: An unforgettable journey through the heart of Japan, visiting Kyoto and Tokyo, experiencing culture, history, and modern life.

locations.story: Kyoto was a serene city with beautiful temples and gardens. The Fushimi Inari Shrine hike was one of the highlights of my trip.
Tokyo was an amazing blend of tradition and technology. The Shibuya Crossing and visiting the Tokyo Tower were unforgettable experiences.

routes.note: Smooth and comfortable ride on the Shinkansen, took around 2.5 hours.
A scenic bus ride to the mountain town of Nikko, known for its historical sites and natural beauty.
